@@ -1,3077 +0,0 @@
-from abc import ABC, abstractmethod%0Aimport math%0A%0A%0Aclass Shape(ABC):%0A    @abstractmethod%0A    def get_area(self):%0A        pass%0A%0A    @abstractmethod%0A    def get_perimeter(self):%0A        pass%0A%0A    @abstractmethod%0A    def get_name(self):%0A        pass%0A%0A%0Aclass Point2D:%0A    def __init__(self, coord_x: float, coord_y: float):%0A        self.coord_x = coord_x%0A        self.coord_y = coord_y%0A%0A    def __str__(self):%0A        return f%22%7Bself.coord_x:.2f%7D, %7Bself.coord_y:.2f%7D%22%0A%0A%0Aclass Circle(Shape):%0A    def __init__(self, center_point: Point2D, radius_value: float):%0A        self.center_point = center_point%0A        self.radius_value = radius_value%0A        self.shape_name = %22Circ%22%0A%0A    def get_name(self):%0A        return self.shape_name%0A%0A    def get_area(self):%0A        return math.pi * (self.radius_value ** 2)%0A%0A    def get_perimeter(self):%0A        return 2 * math.pi * self.radius_value%0A%0A    def __str__(self):%0A        return f%22%7Bself.get_name()%7D: C=(%7Bself.center_point%7D), R=%7Bself.radius_value:.2f%7D%22%0A%0A%0Aclass Rectangle(Shape):%0A    def __init__(self, point_a: Point2D, point_b: Point2D):%0A        self.point_a = point_a%0A        self.point_b = point_b%0A        self.shape_name = %22Rect%22%0A%0A    def get_name(self):%0A        return self.shape_name%0A%0A    def get_area(self):%0A        width = abs(self.point_b.coord_x - self.point_a.coord_x)%0A        height = abs(self.point_b.coord_y - self.point_a.coord_y)%0A        return width * height%0A%0A    def get_perimeter(self):%0A        width = abs(self.point_b.coord_x - self.point_a.coord_x)%0A        height = abs(self.point_b.coord_y - self.point_a.coord_y)%0A        return 2 * (width + height)%0A%0A    def __str__(self):%0A        return f%22%7Bself.get_name()%7D: P1=(%7Bself.point_a%7D) P2=(%7Bself.point_b%7D)%22%0A%0A%0Adef main():%0A    shape_list = %5B%5D%0A%0A    while True:%0A        try:%0A            command_line = input()%0A            parts = command_line.split()%0A            command = parts%5B0%5D%0A%0A            print(%22$%22 + command_line)%0A%0A            if command == %22circle%22:%0A                cx = float(parts%5B1%5D)%0A                cy = float(parts%5B2%5D)%0A                radius = float(parts%5B3%5D)%0A                new_circle = Circle(Point2D(cx, cy), radius)%0A                shape_list.append(new_circle)%0A%0A            elif command == %22rect%22:%0A                x1 = float(parts%5B1%5D)%0A                y1 = float(parts%5B2%5D)%0A                x2 = float(parts%5B3%5D)%0A                y2 = float(parts%5B4%5D)%0A                new_rect = Rectangle(Point2D(x1, y1), Point2D(x2, y2))%0A                shape_list.append(new_rect)%0A%0A            elif command == %22show%22:%0A                for shape in shape_list:%0A                    print(shape)%0A%0A            elif command == %22info%22:%0A                for shape in shape_list:%0A                    print(%0A                        f%22%7Bshape.get_name()%7D: %22%0A                        f%22A=%7Bshape.get_area():.2f%7D %22%0A                        f%22P=%7Bshape.get_perimeter():.2f%7D%22%0A                    )%0A%0A            elif command == %22end%22:%0A                break%0A%0A            else:%0A                print(%22fail: command invalid%22)%0A%0A        except Exception as error:%0A            print(%22fail:%22, error)%0A%0A%0Amain()%0A
